name: Night Sky Wizardry
description:
Use your wizard teleportation powers to help the citizens of Night Sky Town!

This game was made for the Metroidvania Month 18 Game Jam (Nov 15th to Dec 15th, 2022, jam link), under the jam's objective:

"Metroidvanias.  A popular game genre among indie devs (you probably know Hollow Knight, Ori or Axiom Verge) based on Super Metroid and Castlevania in which you explore the map to find upgrades.

In this game jam, I challenge you to make a Metroidvania game in a month!"

Controls (some or all of these will need to be unlocked!):

  • Move with WASD or arrow keys
  • Jump with spacebar
  • Aim with mouse, Launch Teleport Sphere with left-click, and Teleport with right-click

This is more of a prototype than a full game due to my own time constraints, and can be completed in about 5-10 minutes.  I hope to flesh it out some more in the future!

This game uses free assets, including:
